item.description:
This Test Collection verifies that the In-Place Contentlet Copy works correctly.

There are times where a given Contentlet is referenced by several pages. Sometimes, users just want to edit the Contentlet in one specific page without affecting they way such a Contentlet looks like in the other pages. This feature allows them to (1) create an exact copy of the Contentlet -- which replaces the existing one -- and (2) edit that copied Contentlet.
